data.text: “◄Why does Almighty God not set a time when he will judge evil people?/I do not understand why Almighty God does not set a time when he will judge evil people.► [RHQ]
Some evil people remove the markers of boundaries of other people’s land, in order to steal their land;
Some ◄take away/steal► the donkeys that belong to orphans,
Some shove poor people off the road (OR, prevent poor people from ◄obtaining their rights/being treated justly►),
The result is that poor people have to search for food in the desert
The poor people harvest left-over grain in other people’s fields,
During the night they have nothing to cover their bodies,
When it rains on the mountains, the poor people become very wet,
Some evil men snatch infants away from their widowed mothers [SYN],
But the poor people walk around with no clothes on;
Poor people press olives to make olive oil;
In the cities, people who are wounded and dying cry out to God for help,
Some wicked people avoid the light because they do evil things in the dark;
Murderers steal things during the night,
Those who want to commit adultery wait for twilight/evening;
It is during the night that robbers break into houses to steal things,
All of those people want to do their evil things at night, not in the morning when it is light,
“But it is wicked people who are swept/carried away by floods,
Just like the snow melts away when it is hot and there is no rain,
Not even their mothers remember them now;
They mistreat women who have been unable to give birth to children and women who no longer have children to take care of them,
But God, by his power, gets rid of mighty/influential people.
God allows them to think that they are secure and safe,
They prosper for a little while,
If this is not true, is there [RHQ] anyone who will show that I am a liar
